titleStmt.title: A briefe consideration of mans iniquitie, and Gods iustice wherein the distinction of 1. sinnes into veniall, mortall, 2. sinnes and punishments into æquall, vnæquall is scholastically examined.
titleStmt.author: Higgons, Theophilus, 1578?-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By R. Bradock], for Roger Iackson, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleetstreet, neere the Conduit,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Of mans iniquity, and Gods iustice.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Fleetstreet, neere the Conduit
